start.title: Original History
start.text: You are George Washington in 1775. Do you organize the Continental Army?

organize.title: Continental Army Formed
organize.text: The revolution gains momentum. Do you attack Boston?

attackBoston.title: Attack on Boston
attackBoston.text: The attack succeeds! Alternate history: war ends early.

wait.title: Waiting Strategy
wait.text: The British regroup and push back. Revolution fails.
